boardgame.name: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Conquest of Nerath Board Game
boardgame.description: From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;War has come to the Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons world! In the north, the undead legions of the Dark Empire of Karkoth march against the fragile League of Nerath, determined to sweep away the human kingdoms forever. To the south, the infernal Iron Circle launches its own goblin hordes in a campaign of conquest against the elves and corsairs of Vailin. From the snowy expanse of the Winterbole Forest to the sun-warmed coasts of ancient Vailin, four great powers struggle for survival._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Conquest of Nerath is a fantasy conquest game. 2-4 players muster armies of foot soldiers, siege engines, monsters, warships, elementals, and dragons to attack their opponents. Players employ heroes such as knights and wizards to lead their troops and explore dungeons in the search of magical artifacts and treasures to increase their power in combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Origins Awards Best Board Game Winner
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Conquest of Nerath: Sword of Kas Promo
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 19 - D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D Board Games Pit Fight
Point 2 Point Episode 50: WBC 2011 and Conquest of Nerath
The Gaming Gang Episode 26: Conquest of Nerath, Keep Up the Fire, Space Empires 4X, and Sun of York

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: mint! Available starting from the end of June!

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 338060000) ------ Pre-Order ----- Shipping 06/21/11 ------ War has come to the Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons world! In the north, the undead legions of the Dark Empire of Karkoth march against the fragile League of Nerath, determined to sweep away the human kingdoms forever. To the south, the infernal Iron Circle launches its own goblin hordes in a campaign of conquest against the elves and corsairs of Vailin. From the snowy expanse of the Winterbole Forest to the sun-warmed coasts of ancient Vailin, four great powers struggle for survival.
